game.name: PowerWash Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: PowerWash Simulator로 스트레스를 날려버리세요! 세차게 뿜어지는 물줄기 소리로 걱정을 씻어내세요. 파워 세척기를 켜고 눈에 보이는 먼지와 얼룩을 모두 날려 버리고, 반짝이는 마무리로 파워 세척이 주는 소소한 만족감을 느껴보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Release the Pressure with PowerWash Simulator! Wash away your worries with the soothing sounds of high-pressure water. Fire up your power washer and blast away every speck of dirt and grime you can find, all with the simple satisfaction of power-washing to a sparkling finish.

reviewHighlights.text: I came here to clean. I stayed because this game emotionally reprogrammed me. At first glance, PowerWash Simulator looks like a humble little “spray d...
I don't get the appeal, some objects aren't considered clean until you find the literal pixel of dirt left, others rob you of satisfaction of a job we...
